devdoc.author: Kames Geraghty
devdoc.details: The PodFactory creates/initializes TokenDrop smart contract. The factory will generally be called from the PodFactory smart contract directly.

constructor.details: Initializes the Factory with a TokenDrop instance.

devdoc.title: TokenDropFactory (ProxyFactory) - Clones a TokenDrop Instance

tokenDropInstance().notice: Contract template for deploying proxied Comptrollers

userdoc.notice: Create a TokenDrop smart contract, which is associated with Pod smart contract for distribution of an asset token (i.e. POOL).
